title: Who gets first blood if you kill each other at the exact same time?
body: Theoretically if two people were playing the same champ with the same items and runes and they auto attacked each other to death who would get first blood?

replies.body:
Depends on player priority, damage and tick.
if the tick is exactly the same tick.. 
Depends on player priority and damage

1st pick gets 1st blood?

i remember thats how it used to be with karthus R and ludens. 1st pick always got hit by the ludens proc, so i can imagine it being the same regarding to first bloods but its just a qualified guess

If I had to hazard a guess, I would say whomever started their autoattack first. However, if EVERYTHING is exactly the same. I'd say it'd probably be RNG.
whoever is closer to their given server location would probably get the kill first, in all honesty

The game system is also reeee

Sometime you see Champion death portrait before they even die because the game has indicated that they had die, and when this happen you aren't allow to change that future anymore, you can't use flash or try to survive because the game has indicate that you die. Meaning if the enemy ignited you and the game just said you are dead, the ignite will over tick and kill you
There is no such thing as "the exact same time" in LoL.

> There is no such thing as "the exact same time" in LoL.

Due to how LoL uses a priority system to apply damage.. you will be surprised how right you are.
Whoever has the better Ping. Usually if you're Ping is higher you get animation delay which mean everything you do will have delay even in Shooting out Skills shot, AA, Warding etc
